input.sentences: we entered the city and started exploring .
we walked up and down the streets .
we met awesome people along the way .
we stopped in time for a funeral service .
we payed our respects before moving on .
output.sentences: We entered this building and started exploring it.
We walked the streets to see the city.
We met so many awesome people there.
The time went by when we stopped to observe the service.
Many people payed their respects as the line moved along.
